fields.description:
Hello! After few days my ActiveMQ cluster goes to the strange state. When a try write to queue with request like: {quote}curl -u admin:admin -d "body=test" 'http://mylovelyhost.com:8161/api/message/4monitoring?type=queue' {quote} I got error: {quote} Error 500 Server Error

HTTP ERROR 500

Problem accessing /api/message/4monitoring. Reason: 

    Server Error

Caused by:

javax.servlet.ServletException: Could not post JMS message: javax.jms.JMSException: java.lang.NullPointerException

	at javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet.service(HttpServlet.java:648)
	at javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet.service(HttpServlet.java:729)
	at org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.ServletHolder.handle(ServletHolder.java:808)

	at org.apache.activemq.web.MessageServlet.doPost(MessageServlet.java:129)
	... 23 more
